sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { variables } from './Variables.js'; export class Machine extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { machines: [], modalTitle: "", MachineId: 0, MachineName: "", MachineClass: "", MachineCompany: "", MachineState: "" } } refreshList() { fetch(variables.API_URL + 'machine') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { this.setState({ machines: data }); }); } componentDidMount() { this.refreshList(); } changeMachineName = (e) => { this.setState({ MachineName: e.target.value }); } addClick(){ this.setState({ modalTitle:"A침adir M치quina", MachineId:0, MachineName: "", MachineClass: "", MachineCompany: "", MachineState: "" }); } editClick(machin){ this.setState({ modalTitle:"A침adir M치quina", MachineId:machin.MachineId, MachineName: machin.MachineName, MachineClass: machin.MachineClass, MachineCompany: machin.MachineCompany, MachineState: machin.MachineState }); } render() { const { machines, modalTitle, MachineId, MachineName, MachineClass, MachineCompany, MachineState } = this.state; return (
{machines.map(machin => )}
MachineId MachineName MachineClass MachineCompany
{machin.MachineId} {machin.MachineName} {machin.MachineClass} {machin.MachineCompany}
{modalTitle}
MachineName
{MachineId == 0 ? : null} {MachineId != 0 ? : null}
) } }
